mapper.select: SELECT m.name AS member,s.name AS setmeal,o.orderDate,o.orderType FROM t_member m,t_setmeal s,t_order o WHERE o.setmeal_id = s.id AND o.member_id = m.id AND o.id = #{id}
SELECT s.name,COUNT(o.setmeal_id) AS value FROM t_order o,t_setmeal s WHERE o.setmeal_id = s.id GROUP BY s.name
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_order WHERE orderDate = #{date}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_order WHERE orderDate BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_order WHERE orderDate = #{date} AND orderStatus = '已到诊'
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_order WHERE orderDate >= #{date} AND orderStatus = '已到诊'

SELECT s.name, COUNT(o.setmeal_id) AS setmeal_count, COUNT(o.setmeal_id)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order) AS proportion FROM t_order o,t_setmeal s WHERE o.setmeal_id = s.id GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY setmeal_count DESC LIMIT 0,4
SELECT COUNT(sex) AS value ,CASE sex WHEN 1 THEN'男' ELSE '女' END AS name FROM t_member GROUP BY sex
